sentence: Every one of them, from Kari Lake to Blake Masters to Matt Salmon to Mark Brnovich to Karrin Taylor Robson, are promising to either finish the wall or miraculously secure our southern border with Mexico.
author: Elvia Díaz
title: Trump's $15 billion, supposedly impenetrable border wall with Mexico is a joke

author: Staff
title: Longest-serving US congressman Don Young dies aged 88 midair on flight from LA to Seattle: Republican Alaska representative served his state for 25 years and filed for reelection

sentence: Maybe Kari Lake, the former newscaster and Republican governor wannabe, is that deranged to believe in Making America White Again.
author: Elvia Díaz
title: Do candidates who scream 'border invasion' really want an America without immigrants?
